title.en: Aspiration to Be Chanted at the Conclusion of the Recitation

text.en: Having first set your mind upon supreme awakening,
text.en-trans: dangpo changchub chok tu tukkyé né

text.en: You became enlightened, a guide to beings, just as your aspired.
text.en-trans: tuk mön zhindu sangye drowa dren

text.en: In devotion, I bow before the gurus, victors and their heirs:
text.en-trans: lama gyalwa sé ché güpé dü

text.en: Grant your blessings, that my own aspirations may be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: dak gi mönlam drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Through the virtue that we yogis, the teacher and students,
text.en-trans: naljor dakchak pönlob khor ché kyi

text.en: Have accumulated through our recitation of the Maṇi,1
text.en-trans: khatön mani tönpé gewa dang

text.en: And the force of virtue amassed throughout the three times,
text.en-trans: zhenyang dü sum sakpé gewé tü

text.en: May all the wishes of the gracious guru be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: drinchen lamé zhedön kün drub shok

text.en: May our kind parents, who gave us life and physical form,
text.en-trans: lü sok kyepé drinchen pama dang

text.en: Our kind dharma friends, monks, students and patrons,
text.en-trans: chö drok dra lob yöndak drinchen dang

text.en: And all the kind animals we’ve ridden, burdened, and milked
text.en-trans: zhön kal zhöpé go zok drinchen kün

text.en: Swiftly attain complete and perfect enlightenment.
text.en-trans: nyurdu dzokpé sangye tobpar shok

text.en: May all the beings whose flesh we’ve eaten and whose hides we’ve worn,
text.en-trans: sha zö pu dang pakpa gyönpa dang

text.en: Whom we’ve beaten with sticks and stones and killed with weapons,
text.en-trans: do dang yukpé dung dang tsön gyi sé

text.en: Whom we’ve poisoned, forcibly slaughtered, and trampled upon,
text.en-trans: duk dang tü sé kangpé chur tsé kyi

text.en: Swiftly attain the level of perfect enlightenment.
text.en-trans: dro nam sangye gopang nyur tob shok

text.en: May all sentient beings, my very own mothers,
text.en-trans: zhenyang namkha yangpé ta nyampé

text.en: Equal in number to the vastness of space itself,
text.en-trans: mar gyur semchen chik kyang malüpa

text.en: Complete the accumulations, purify obscurations and attain enlightenment.
text.en-trans: tsok dzok drib jang sangye tobpar shok

text.en: May these prayers of aspiration swiftly be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: mönlam dedak nyurdu drub gyur chik
